Cerebellum candelabrum cell.Title: The candelabrum cell: a new interneuron in the cerebellar cortex.
Cerebellum candelabrum cell.Definition: Neuron with perikaryon located inside the Purkinje cell layer. It is squeezed, either between the bulging parts of the PC somata or in the space left free between their upper poles, just at the level of the lower border of the molecular layer.
